refsect1.title: Bugs
refsect1.para: We like, as much as you, as few bugs as possible in conglomerate. If you find a bug in conglomerate report it at . If it is already reported, update the bugreport. So we know that the bug did bite again.
There is no guarantee how much it will effect our priority, but a bug that is unknown to us, will never get attention nor get squashed.
